task.summary: Converting a regular expression from infix to postfix form. Starting to work on the Glushkov's construction algorithm.
Adding the regular expression's converter from infix to postfix form.
Adding epsilon-closure to the Automaton class. Updating the output function of the State as a DFS.
Constructing the DFA from the NFA.
